topics.title: What are things you like doing in your free time?
prompts: I like to stay home to spend most of my activities.
I am always out and about.
responses: Maybe just get comfortable at home to watch a nice movie.
Doing sports, exploring cafes and perhaps catch a movie in the cinema.

topics.title: How would you describe yourself?
prompts: I would describe myself an explorer
I am an extrovert and prefer interaction with big groups
responses: I enjoy my time with friends at home playing boardgames.
I always try to explore hiking spots to discover places.
I am always the life of the party!
